content: Hello everybody. Please, I would like to know if there is any Project in Rust for Development of a Framework similar to LLVM but written specifically for Linux.
The closest thing to LLVM that I know of written in Rust is Cranelift. It's not really Linux specific, although I'm guessing most of the developers use Linux as their daily driver.
Thank you very much for information, eholk :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
I can be generic, not more specific in this case...
